from DateTime import DateTime
 import json
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 if portal.ERP5Site_isSupportRequestCreationClosed():
 # Stop ticket creation
 return
 
 if (DateTime() - context.getCreationDate()) < 2:
 # Ignore recently created instances.
 return
 
 reference = context.getReference()
 memcached_dict = context.getPortalObject().portal_memcached.getMemcachedDict(
 key_prefix='slap_tool',
 plugin_path='portal_memcached/default_memcached_plugin')
 
 try:
 d = memcached_dict[reference]
 except KeyError:
 return
 
 d = json.loads(d)
 result = d['text']
 last_contact = DateTime(d.get('created_at'))
 
 # Optimise by checking memcache information first.
 if result.startswith('#error '):
 service = context.getSpecialiseValue(portal_type='Hosting Subscription')
 hosting_title = service.getTitle()
 ticket_title = "Service %s in error state" % service.getReference()
 description = "The instance %s of service %s has been in error state (last contact date: %s)" % (
 reference, hosting_title, last_contact)
 support_request_url = context.Base_generateSupportRequestForSlapOS(
 ticket_title, description, service.getRelativeUrl())
 
 if not support_request_url:
 return
 
 support_request = portal.restrictedTraverse(support_request_url, None)
 person_url = service.getDestinationSection()
 
 if support_request is None or not person_url:
 return support_request_url
 
 notification_message = portal.portal_notifications.getDocumentValue(
 reference='slapos-crm-hosting_subscription_state.notification')
 if notification_message is None:
 message = """Dear user,
 %s.
 Do not hesitate to visit the web forum (http://community.slapos.org/forum) in case of question.
 
 Regards,
 
 The slapos team""" % description
 else:
 mapping_dict = {'hosting_title':hosting_title,
 'hosting_url':service.getRelativeUrl(),
 'instance_title':context.getTitle(),
 'last_contact':last_contact}
 message = notification_message.asText(
 substitution_method_parameter_dict={'mapping_dict':mapping_dict})
 
 support_request.SupportRequest_trySendNotificationMessage(
 ticket_title, message, person_url, 0)
 
 return support_request_url
